meta-review.comment: Lightyear Frontier takes the farming and crafting genre to a whole new level by letting you explore and collect resources in a big stompy robot suit. The charming world and nature-focused gameplay makes it a relaxing and visually stunning experience. With a well-defined roadmap for updates and a promising cooperative mode, this early-access gem has the potential to become the ultimate chill-out game for both solo and multiplayer adventures.
